meaning: Hello. My name is Paul. I go to work every day.

meaning: Thank you! I like my books too.

meaning: Shall we go to the park? to the zoo?

word: Ah! Nous mangeons un croissant au parc!

word: Bonjour Alice ça va bien. Nous allons au parc?
meaning: Hello Alice how are you. We are going to the park?

meaning: No, I'm going to the restaurant.

word: Ah, j'aime les restaurants. Tu veux une pizza?
meaning: Ah, I like restaurants. Do you want a pizza?

category: Radio: Secret Rendezvous - Lucy is Listening
meaning: Yes, I like pizza a lot.

category: Radio: Secret Rendezvous - Lucy is Listening
meaning: Perfect, let's go to the restaurant together.

word: D'accord, c'est bien. Tu aimes le chocolat?
meaning: Okay, that's good. Do you like chocolate?

word: J'aime le chocolat. Je mange beaucoup de chocolat.
meaning: I like chocolate. I eat a lot of chocolate.

word: Super! Le chocolat est bon. Tu aimes lire un livre?
meaning: Great! The chocolate is good. Do you like to read a book?

word: D'accord. On peut parler encore ensemble.
meaning: Okay. We can talk together again.

meaning: Hello, my name is Alice. I like music.

word: Nous avons un professeur très gentil.
meaning: We have a very nice teacher.

meaning: How many tickets do you want?

word: D'accord. Vous avez besoin de votre carte, je suppose?

word: Je veux du chocolat, Zari. J'aime le chocolat!
meaning: I want some chocolate, Zari. I like chocolate!

word: Je prends le métro pour aller à l'école.
meaning: I take the subway to go to school.

word: Le métro? Non, je veux du chocolat!
meaning: The subway? No, I want chocolate!

word: Non, Junior. Tu veux une orange?
meaning: No, Junior. Do you want an orange?

word: Oui, j'adore les oranges! Je veux manger l'orange et lire.
meaning: Yes, I love oranges! I want to eat the orange and read.

word: Tu veux une orange et un livre.
meaning: You want an orange and a book.

word: Oui. Une orange et un livre. Et mon animal de compagnie, s'il te plaît!
meaning: Yes. An orange and a book. And my pet, please!

word: Une orange, un livre et son animal de compagnie...
meaning: An orange, a book and its pet...

word: J'aime manger et livre avec mon animal de compagnie, Praline! Merci!
meaning: I like to eat and read with my pet, Praline! Thank you!
